nodes.text: The Redstar was a Galactic Alliance frigate.

In 44 ABY, the Redstar dropped Jedi Masters Luke Skywalker and Jaina Solo off at the entrance to The Maw for their mission to Abeloth's planet. After the mission, Luke regained consciousness in a medbay over Coruscant aboard a large vessel, which he thought was most likely the Redstar.
